string.value: I should check up on Moppie, as he is waiting for his master who left him with the words "I'll be back" as he went on his studies.

I should find Moppie's master, Huckle, since he was the one that Moppie with the words "I'll be back" as he went on his studies. Huckle should be somewhere safe in Orbis Tower working on his studies ... but where exactly?
I found Huckle, who was diligently working on his studies at the Orbis Tower. He looked like he hadn't bathed in weeks.

Bark, I'd love to go see him myself, but I don't think I can handle the monsters yet, so ... bark! You! I think you can handle those monsters outside ... so what do you think? Can you find my master for me? Bark bark, just to see if he's doing alright, bark!

Did my master safely run past those scary monsters? Bark ... it's been a long time since he left me out here to pursue his studies ... and I can't believe he's been gone this long without saying a word.
Thanks, bark! You must be an incredibly kind person, bark! I have a feeling something good may happen to you, bark!!
My master is doing his studies at a safe place in Orbis Tower, bark. His name is HUCKLE! Bark bark!
My master should be somewhere around Orbis Tower, bark bark. Please find my master...
Are you interested in my work? Well, the results are still a big secret. What? No? Then what are you here for? Moppie? Who's ... Moppie??
My Moppie? The cute, little Moppie that followed my every move? I have totally forgotten about him ... he may have been tiny, but he was a very loyal dog ...
What, Moppie's all grown up now? Has the time gone by that fast? I remember he used to fit in my bag when I got here ... and now Moppie's waiting for me...
Thanks for finding me here. You even took care of my Moppie. I must Say, you're a person of great heart. Thank you.
You haven't found my master, bark? He's at Orbis Tower!! His name is HUCKLE! Bark bark!
